detectors.description:
ERC20._transfer(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VMSChain.sol#208-214) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- _balances[from] = _balances[from].sub(value) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VMSChain.sol#211)
detectors.markdown:
[ERC20._transfer(address,address,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VMSChain.sol#L208-L214) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- [_balances[from] = _balances[from].sub(value)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VMSChain.sol#L211)

detectors.description:
VMSChain (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VMSChain.sol#293-317) inherits the contract, there is a conflict between state variables and functions
	Conflicting functions and state variables:
	- ERC20.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VMSChain.sol#101-103)
	- ERC20.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VMSChain.sol#159-164)
	- IERC20.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VMSChain.sol#76)
	- ERC20.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VMSChain.sol#120-122)
	- ERC20.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VMSChain.sol#143-149)
	- IERC20.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VMSChain.sol#74)
	- IERC20.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VMSChain.sol#78)
	- IERC20.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VMSChain.sol#80)
	- IERC20.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VMSChain.sol#82)
	- ERC20.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VMSChain.sol#110-112)
	- ERC20.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VMSChain.sol#129-132)
	- IERC20.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VMSChain.sol#72)
detectors.markdown:
[VMSChain](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VMSChain.sol#L293-L317) inherits the contract, there is a conflict between state variables and functions
	Conflicting functions and state variables:
	- [ERC20.totalSupply()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VMSChain.sol#L101-L103)
	- [ERC20.transferFrom(address,address,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VMSChain.sol#L159-L164)
	- [IERC20.transferFrom(address,address,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VMSChain.sol#L76)
	- [ERC20.allowance(address,address)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VMSChain.sol#L120-L122)
	- [ERC20.approve(address,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VMSChain.sol#L143-L149)
	- [IERC20.approve(address,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VMSChain.sol#L74)
	- [IERC20.totalSupply()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VMSChain.sol#L78)
	- [IERC20.balanceOf(address)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VMSChain.sol#L80)
	- [IERC20.allowance(address,address)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VMSChain.sol#L82)
	- [ERC20.balanceOf(address)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VMSChain.sol#L110-L112)
	- [ERC20.transfer(address,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VMSChain.sol#L129-L132)
	- [IERC20.transfer(address,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VMSChain.sol#L72)

detectors.description:
ERC20Detailed.constructor(string,string,uint8).name (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VMSChain.sol#265) shadows:
	- ERC20Detailed.name() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VMSChain.sol#274-276) (function)

ERC20Detailed.constructor(string,string,uint8).symbol (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VMSChain.sol#265) shadows:
	- ERC20Detailed.symbol() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VMSChain.sol#281-283) (function)

ERC20Detailed.constructor(string,string,uint8).decimals (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VMSChain.sol#265) shadows:
	- ERC20Detailed.decimals() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VMSChain.sol#288-290) (function)

VMSChain.burn(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VMSChain.sol#305-309) should emit an event for: 
	- burned = burned.add(value) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VMSChain.sol#306)
Pragma version^0.5.0 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VMSChain.sol#9) allows old versions
solc-0.5.0 is not recommended for deployment
detectors.markdown: solc-0.5.0 is not recommended for deployment
